hero.subtitle: Empower AI to tackle complex tasks and navigate large codebases with precision
hero.description: Build custom workflows and prompts for your team's specific needs. Maintain your personal library of reusable patterns. Guide AI through complex multi-step processes in large projects with structured, validated workflows.

features.title: Built for Every Team
features.subtitle: Empower AI to handle complex projects and maintain team-specific knowledge libraries

complexTasks.title: Handle Complex Tasks
complexTasks.description: Multi-step workflows guide AI through intricate processes, breaking down large features into manageable, validated stages.

bigCodebases.title: Navigate Big Codebases
bigCodebases.description: Structured context helps AI understand large projects, maintain consistency across modules, and respect your architecture patterns.

teamWorkflows.title: Team Workflows
teamWorkflows.description: Create and share custom workflows tailored to your team's specific needs, tech stack, and development practices.

personalLibrary.title: Personal Library
personalLibrary.description: Build and maintain your own library of reusable workflows and mini-prompts. Keep your proven patterns organized and accessible.

reduceHallucinations.title: Reduce Hallucinations
reduceHallucinations.description: Structured workflows provide complete context so AI generates accurate, validated code instead of inventing APIs or hardcoding secrets.

visualBuilder.title: Visual Workflow Builder
visualBuilder.description: Drag-and-drop constructor makes it easy to create sophisticated workflows without writing YAML or configuration files.

mcpIntegration.title: MCP Integration
mcpIntegration.description: Native Model Context Protocol support for Claude Code, Cursor, and any AI assistant. Seamlessly integrates with your tools.

setup.title: Quick Setup
setup.subtitle: Get started in minutes with Cursor

step1.title: Add MCP Server
step1.description: Configure the MCP server in your IDE settings
step1.note: Add this configuration to your Cursor MCP settings
step1.tokenNote: API Token is Optional: Without a token, you'll have access to all system workflows. Add your API token (from Settings â†’ API Tokens) to also access your personal library workflows.

step2.title: Start Using
step2.description: Ask your AI assistant for intelligent workflow recommendations

step3.title: Create Custom Workflows
step3.description: Use the built-in AI assistant to design workflows tailored to your team
step3.example1: Help me create a workflow for implementing authentication with OAuth
step3.example2: Create a mini-prompt for writing API documentation
step3.example3: What's the best workflow structure for a microservices project?

roadmap.title: Roadmap
roadmap.subtitle: Upcoming features to enhance AI-driven development workflows

item1.title: Cursor Extension + Sub-Agents
item1.description: Deep Cursor integration with isolated context and multiple agents support

item2.title: Advanced Figma & Layout Workflows
item2.description: Enhanced UI implementation flows with design system integration

item3.title: Extended Workflow Library
item3.description: Enhanced bug tracing, refactoring, and integrated testing strategies

welcome.title: Welcome to Agents Playbook
welcome.subtitle: Learn how to prevent AI hallucinations and build reliable workflows in just 5 steps.
welcome.whyWorkflowsDesc: Planning ahead saves time on re-iteration, prevents bugs, ensures consistency in requirements, and helps AI understand context betterâ€”reducing wasted effort and improving code quality.

mcpIntegration.title: MCP Server Integration
mcpIntegration.subtitle: Connect Agents Playbook to Claude Code and Cursor
mcpIntegration.tokenOptionalDesc: Without a token, you'll have access to all system workflows. Add your API token to also access your personal library workflows.
mcpIntegration.getTokenDesc: To access your personal library workflows, create an API token:
mcpIntegration.step1: Go to Settings â†’ API Tokens
mcpIntegration.step3: Copy the token and add it to your MCP config
mcpIntegration.usageInstructions: In Claude Code or Cursor, type:
mcpIntegration.usageNote: The AI will load your workflow and guide you step-by-step through requirements, design, implementation, and testing.
mcpIntegration.needHelpDesc: Visit our documentation for step-by-step guides and troubleshooting.

discover.title: Discover Workflows
discover.subtitle: Explore our library of battle-tested workflows designed by experts
discover.step1Desc: Use semantic search to find workflows by describing your problem. Filter by complexity, tags, and ratings.
discover.step2Desc: Click any workflow to see its stages and mini-prompts. Rate workflows to help the community find the best solutions.
discover.step3Desc: Found a workflow you like? Import it to your library with one click. Customize it later to fit your needs.
discover.visitDiscover: Visit Discover page to browse workflows

library.title: Your Library
library.subtitle: Organize workflows and mini-prompts for your projects
library.workflowsDesc: Complete multi-step processes with defined stages and execution order.
library.workflowsFeature3: Smart step skipping based on context
library.miniPromptsDesc: Reusable prompt templates for specific tasks and operations.
library.proTipDesc: Import proven workflows from Discover, then create custom mini-prompts as you identify repeated patterns in your work.

createWorkflow.title: Create Custom Workflows
createWorkflow.subtitle: Build workflows visually with our drag-and-drop constructor
createWorkflow.step1Desc: Organize your workflow into logical phases like "Analysis", "Design", "Implementation"
createWorkflow.step2Desc: Drag mini-prompts from your library into stages. Reorder them to define execution sequence.
createWorkflow.step3Desc: Set complexity, tags, and visibility (PUBLIC/PRIVATE). Save to use with MCP server.
createWorkflow.bestPracticeDesc: Assign one agent per stage to prevent context collapse. Use review steps between stages to maintain clarity and allow validation before proceeding.
createWorkflow.contextManagementDesc: Keep AI agents aligned across workflow stages with automatic mini-prompts:
createWorkflow.memoryBoardDesc: Enable "With Review" on stages to add handoff review prompts
createWorkflow.multiAgentChatDesc: Enable globally to add coordination chat after each mini-prompt
createWorkflow.realTimePreviewDesc: See your workflow structure as you build
createWorkflow.smartValidationDesc: Ensures all required fields are complete
createWorkflow.aiAssistantDesc: Need help creating your workflow? Use the built-in AI assistant to:
createWorkflow.generateWorkflowsDesc: Describe your task and get a complete workflow structure
createWorkflow.createMiniPromptsDesc: Ask AI to write custom prompts for specific tasks
createWorkflow.getRecommendationsDesc: Receive suggestions for improving workflow structure
createWorkflow.aiAssistantNote: The AI assistant is available in the workflow constructor and library sections
createWorkflow.tryConstructorDesc: Create your first custom workflow with AI assistance

combinations.title: Combining Workflows
combinations.subtitle: Chain workflows together for complex projects and better results
combinations.step1Desc: Use the Product Requirements Architect workflow to break down your project.
combinations.step1Tip: Pro Tip: Each feature file includes a ready-to-use prompt for Feature Development!
combinations.step2Title: Dive Deep with Feature Development Workflow
combinations.step2Desc: For each feature from the PRD, use the Feature Development workflow.
step2ProcessItems: Copy the ready-to-use prompt from the feature file
Run Feature Development workflow with that prompt
Workflow goes through: Analysis â†’ Design â†’ Planning â†’ Implementation â†’ Testing
References design.md and design-system.md for consistency
combinations.step2Result: Result: Production-ready implementation that follows the PRD specs exactly!
combinations.structuredPlanningDesc: PRD creates the blueprint. Each feature is documented with clear requirements.
combinations.focusedExecutionDesc: Feature Development follows the plan without deviating or hallucinating.
combinations.betterResultsDesc: Each workflow stage validates against the PRD, ensuring consistency.
combinations.readyToTryDesc: Start with a simple project: Use PRD Creation to plan, then Feature Development to build each piece.

docsStep.title: DOCUMENTATION
docsStep.subtitle: Quick reference guides for all platform features
docsStep.proTipContent: You can always access this documentation from the Getting Started section in the navigation bar.

discovery.title: Finding Workflows
discovery.semanticSearchDesc: Describe what you need in natural language. Our AI-powered search understands intent, not just keywords.
discovery.filtersDesc: Narrow results by complexity (XS-XL), rating (3-5 stars), usage count, tags, and number of stages.
discovery.systemVsUserDesc: System workflows are curated by the platform. User workflows are community-contributed.

library.title: Managing Your Library
library.workflowsDesc: Multi-stage processes with mini-prompts. Create custom workflows or import from Discovery.
library.miniPromptsDesc: Reusable prompt templates for specific tasks. Drag them into workflow stages.
library.activeVsInactiveDesc: Only active workflows appear in your MCP server. Toggle status to control availability.
library.publicVsPrivateDesc: PUBLIC workflows appear in Discovery. PRIVATE workflows are user-only.

workflows.title: Building Workflows
workflows.visualConstructorDesc: Drag-and-drop interface. Create stages, add mini-prompts, and organize your workflow visually.
workflows.stagesDesc: Organize workflow into phases like Analysis, Design, Implementation, Testing, Review.
workflows.miniPromptsDesc: Drag mini-prompts from your library into stages. Reorder them by dragging.
workflows.complexityDesc: Set T-shirt size: XS (quick fix), S (simple), M (moderate), L (complex), XL (advanced).
workflows.tagsDesc: Categorize workflows for discovery (Testing, Security, Refactoring, etc.).

mcp.title: MCP Integration
mcp.setupClaudeCodeDesc: Add configuration to your MCP settings with the platform URL and your API token.
mcp.setupCursorDesc: Add to mcpServers section in your Cursor configuration file.
mcp.gettingApiTokenDesc: Go to Settings > API Tokens > Create New Token. Copy and add to MCP config as the "apiKey" field.
mcp.troubleshootingDesc: Check token is active, URL is correct, and workflow is marked as Active.

sharing.title: Sharing & Collaboration
sharing.visibilitySettingsDesc: PUBLIC workflows appear in Discovery. PRIVATE workflows are user-only.
sharing.shareLinksDesc: Create time-limited links (1-30 days) to share with anyone, even non-users.
sharing.ratingSystemDesc: Rate workflows 1-5 stars. Ratings help others discover quality content.
sharing.importingDesc: Add any public workflow to your library. Imported workflows become your own copy.
